column4: I am new to ubuntu .. I copied my favs from IE to a CD .. now I need to know how to import to firefox .. can anyone please help me?
I don't know that way, but I know an indirect way that has some advantages.

install Firefox on your Windows machine.  It'll offer to import your IE bookmarks.  Let it.  Then install the plugin Foxmarks.  It'll let you upload your bookmarks to a central server and you can use them on any Firefox installation on any machine or OS that you use that you also add Foxmarks to.
it's a great thing if you use more than one OS, or more than one machine.  Your bookmarks will always be synchronized on all of them.
